sen.j: 修学院駅（しゅうがくいんえき）は、京都市左京区にある叡山電鉄叡山電鉄叡山本線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Shugakuin Station, located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a railway station of the Eizan (Main) Line operated by Eizan Electric Railway Co.,Ltd.
Shugakuin Station, located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a railway station of the Eizan (Main) Line operated by Eizan Electric Railway Co., Ltd.
Shugakuin Station, located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a railway station of the Eizan Main Line operated by Eizan Electric Railway Co., Ltd.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 相対式二面二線のプラットホームを持つ。
sen.e: This station has a pair of separate platforms for 2 tracks.
This station has a pair of separate platforms for two tracks.
This station is located on the ground level, with two platforms serving two tracks between them.
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 両ホームはほぼ全体が上屋に覆われている。
sen.e: Both platforms are almost fully covered by roofs.
Both platforms are almost entirely roofed.
Both platforms are almost entirely roofed.

sen.j: 無人駅ではあるが、出町柳方面ホームには自動券売機が、両ホーム入り口にはスルッとKANSAI共通カード対応自動改札機（ゲートのないタイプ）が設置されており、始発から22時30分まで稼動する。
sen.e: Although this is an unmanned station, automatic ticket machines are set on a platform for trains bound for Demachiyanagi Station and automatic ticket checkers (those of with no gates) which can deal with KANSAI THRU PASS cards are set on both platforms and they operate from the time of first train until 22:30.

Although it's an unmanned station, automatic ticket machines are set on a platform for the trains bound for Demachiyanagi Station, while automatic ticket checkers (those without gates) that can handle KANSAI THRU PASS cards are available on both platforms, operating from the time of the first train until 22:30 (10:30 p.m.).

Although it's an unmanned station, automatic ticket machines are set on a platform for the trains bound for Demachiyanagi Station, while automatic ticket checkers (those without gates) that can handle KANSAI THRU PASS cards are available on both platforms, operating from the time of the first train until 22:30 (10:30 p.m.).

sen.j: 出入口は北の北山通側（宝ヶ池駅側）にある。
sen.e: The entrance is situated at the north side of the station with facing Kitayama-dori Street (the side of Takaragaike Station).
The entrance is situated at the north side of the station facing Kitayama-dori Street (the side of Takaragaike Station).
The entrance is situated at the north side of the station facing Kitayama-dori Street (the side of Takaragaike Station).

sen.j: 八瀬比叡山口駅・鞍馬駅方面行きホームの南側には男女共用のトイレがある。
sen.e: Toilets of common use for male and female are situated at the south end of the platform for trains bound for Yase-Hieizanguchi Station/ Kurama Station.
Common toilets for males and females are situated at the south end of the platform for trains bound for Yase-Hieizanguchi Station/Kurama Station.
Common toilets for males and females are situated at the south end of the platform for trains bound for Yase-Hieizanguchi Station/Kurama Station.

sen.j: 下りホームには改札横のスロープ通路から、上りホームにはホーム裏から下記運輸課への入口を介して車椅子等での移動が可能であるが、定期乗車券販売所やトイレへの移動は困難。
sen.e: Although persons in wheelchairs can move to the paltform for down-trains through a ramp beside ticket chekers and to the rear of the platform for up-trains through the entrance to Transportation Section, it is imposible for them to move to the commuter ticket sales office and/or toilets.

Although persons in wheelchairs can move to the platform for down trains through a ramp beside the ticket checkers and to the rear of the platform for up trains through the entrance to the Transportation Section, it's impossible for them to move to the commuter ticket sales office and/or the toilets.

Although persons in wheelchairs can move to the platform for outbound trains through a ramp beside the ticket checkers and to the rear of the platform for inbound trains through the entrance to the Transportation Section, it's impossible for them to move to the commuter ticket sales office and/or the toilets.
sen.cmt: 上り、下り→inbound, outbound としました。

sen.j: ホームは両側共にぎりぎり3両分の長さがあり、1990年代までは単行と2両編成の電車の車両交換が行われていた。
sen.e: The length of both platforms is barely equivalent to that of 3 cars and until 1990's, exchange of a car between single-car trains and two-cars trains used to be done at this station.
The length of both platforms is barely equivalent to that of three cars, and until the 1990s the exchange of a car between single-car trains and two-cars trains used to be done at this station.
The length of both platforms is barely equivalent to that of three cars, and until the 1990s the exchange of a car between single-car trains and two-cars trains used to be done at this station.

sen.j: 長く駅員の手旗合図によってきたが、末期には代用の色灯信号も設置されていた。
sen.e: In doing such exchange, flag signaling by the station staff had long been used but during last days, colored signal lamps which substitute for flag signalling were set.
Flag signaling by the station's staff had long been used in conducting such exchange, but in recent times colored signal lamps that substitute for flag signaling have been employed.
Flag signaling by the station's staff had long been used in conducting such exchange, but in recent times colored signal lamps that substitute for flag signaling have been employed.

sen.j: 現在ではこの姿は見られず、必要な場合は出町柳まで回送して交換している。
sen.e: At present, such a scene is no more seen at this station because when exchange is necessary, trains are driven without passengers to Demachiyanagi Station and exchange is done there..
Today, such a scene is no more seen at this station because, when exchange is necessary, trains are driven without passengers to Demachiyanagi Station and the exchange is done there.
Today, such a scene is no more seen at this station because, when exchange is necessary, trains are driven without passengers to Demachiyanagi Station and the exchange is done there.

sen.j: 出町柳行きホーム隣のローズマンション2階には叡山電鉄の運輸課があり、定期乗車券や乗車券乗車券の種類が販売されている。
sen.e: The Transportation Section of Eizan Electric Railway is situated on the 2nd floor of Rose Mansion, which is adjacent to the platform for trains bound for Demachiyanagi Station, and commuter tickets as well as other kinds of tickets are on sale there.
sen.cmt: 「乗車券乗車券の種類」→何らかの誤りと思います。とりあえず、「その他の種類の乗車券」と解釈して翻訳しております。
sen.e: The Eizan Electric Railway's Transportation Section is situated on the second floor of the Rose Mansion, which is adjacent to the platform for trains bound for Demachiyanagi Station, and commuter tickets (as well as other kinds of tickets) are sold there.

The Eizan Electric Railway's Transportation Section is situated on the second floor of the Rose Mansion, a condominium, which is adjacent to the platform for trains bound for Demachiyanagi Station, and commuter tickets (as well as other kinds of tickets) are sold there.
sen.cmt: ローズマンションにcondominiumと補足しました。

sen.j: （大人用回数券については駅前のセブンイレブン京都修学院駅前店でも発売している）また、よく乗務員の交代が行われている。
sen.e: （Coupon tickets for adult are on sale also at Seven-Eleven Kyoto Shugakuin-ekimae store located in front of the station) Change of train crews is often done at this station.
（Coupon tickets for adult fares are also sold at the Seven-Eleven Kyoto Shugakuin-ekimae store located in front of the station); the change of train crews is often done at this station.
（Coupon tickets for adult fares are also sold at the Seven-Eleven Kyoto Shugakuin-ekimae store located in front of the station); the change of train crews is often done at this station.

sen.j: 開業当時は現在より約100m北側にあり、駅出口は現在駅前にあるプラザ修学院の裏の道に面していて、ここが駅前通りとなっていた。
sen.e: When commenced operation, this station was located about 100m away to northward with its entrance faced the street behind Plaza Shugakuin, which is currently located in front of the station, and this street used to be a station road.

When the station commenced operation, it was located about 100m to the north and its entrance faced the street behind Plaza Shugakuin, which is currently located in front of the station; this street used to be a station road.

When the station commenced operation, it was located about 100m to the north and its entrance faced the street behind Plaza Shugakuin, which is currently located in front of the station; this street used to be a station road.

sen.j: 駅構造、配線等は現在とほぼ同じであった。
sen.e: Structure of the station as well as the arrangement of tracks was almost same with current one.
sen.cmt: 配線は電気配線ではなく、線路の配置と解釈しております。
sen.e: The structure of the station and arrangement of tracks were nearly what they are today.
The structure of the station and arrangement of tracks were nearly what they are today.

sen.j: 駅業務ならびに運輸関係の事務所は駅西側、現在の北山通あたりにあり、駅前通を挟んで離宮道との間（現在の京福マンションの位置）にも事務所や倉庫があった。
sen.e: The office of station jobs and transportation jobs was located west of the station, at the place where current Kitayama-dori Street runs, and there were another office and a warehouse at the place between the station road and Rikyu-michi (the place where Keifuku Mansion is currently located).

The office of station and transportation employment was located west of the station, at the place where the current Kitayama-dori Street runs, and there were another offices and a warehouse at the place between the station road and Rikyu-michi (the place where Keifuku Mansion is currently located).

The office for station and transportation related affairs was located west of the station, at the place where the current Kitayama-dori Street runs, and there were another offices and a warehouse at the place between the station road and Rikyu-michi (the place where Keifuku Mansion is currently located).

sen.j: 東側のホーム裏（現在の北山通の位置）は車庫裏と言うべき所で、草むした線路の上に廃台車や部品が転がっていた。
sen.e: The land behind the east platform was a kind of carbarn backyard and abandoned trucks and parts were left on the tracks rank with weeds.
The land behind the east platform was a kind of car barn backyard; abandoned trucks and parts were left on the tracks, which were overgrown with weeds.
The land behind the east platform was a kind of car barn backyard; abandoned trucks and parts were left on the tracks, which were overgrown with weeds.

sen.j: また1960年代までは出町柳方面行きホームの入口脇に売店があり、出札窓口を兼ねていたが、通常時は上下ホーム共に集札は乗務員と駅員によって車両ドア付近で行われており駅への出入は自由であった。
sen.e: Until 1960's, although a shop situated beside the entrance of the platform for trains bound for Demachiyanagi Station held a role of ticket window in addition to its regular one, going in and out of the station was free under normal circumstances since the inspection and collection of tickets was done by train crews and the station staff at the place nearby train doors on both platforms.

Until the 1960s, although a shop situated beside the entrance of the platform for trains bound for Demachiyanagi Station served as a ticket window in addition to its regular one, going in and out of the station was free under normal circumstances because the inspection and collection of tickets was done by train crews and the station staff at the place near the train doors on both platforms.

Until the 1960s, although a shop situated beside the entrance of the platform for trains bound for Demachiyanagi Station served as a ticket window in addition to its regular one, going in and out of the station was free under normal circumstances because the inspection and collection of tickets was done by train crews and the station staff at the place near the train doors on both platforms.

sen.j: 1970年に北山通の建設により南へ約100mほど移動し、事務所も現在のトイレ横の建物に移動している。
sen.e: When Kitayama-dori Street was constructed in 1970, the station was moved about 100m to southward and the office was also moved to the current building located beside toilets.
When Kitayama-dori Street was constructed in 1970, the station was moved about 100m south and the office was moved to a spot adjacent to the toilets in the current building.
When Kitayama-dori Street was constructed in 1970, the station was moved about 100 meters south and the office was moved to a spot adjacent to the toilets in the current building.

sen.j: なおこの建物は叡山電鉄として独立してから、出町柳駅隣接のビルが完成するまで本社事務所（登記上の本店所在地）となっていた。
sen.e: Incidentally, this building had been the head office of Eizan Electric Railway Co.,Ltd. (registered head office) during the period from its independence until the completion of the building adjacent to Demachiyanagi Station.

Incidentally, this building had been the head office of Eizan Electric Railway Co., Ltd. (registered head office) during the period from its independence until the completion of the building adjacent to Demachiyanagi Station.

Incidentally, this building had been the head office of Eizan Electric Railway Co., Ltd. (registered head office) during the period from its independence until the completion of the building adjacent to Demachiyanagi Station.

sen.j: 1980年頃の東側住宅地は学生アパートなどが多く、駅周辺にも吉野家、ハンバーガショップ、餃子の王将、といったファーストフード店が進出し、ある意味一番華やかであった時代と言えよう。
sen.e: As there were a lot of apartments for students in the residential district located in the east area of the station and accordingly many fast-food restaurants, such as Yoshinoya, hamburger shops and Gyoza no Ohsho, opened around the station in 1980's, it can be said that the area around the station was most brilliant in this period.

Because there were many apartments for students in the residential district east of the station, and because many fast-food restaurants--such as Yoshinoya, hamburger shops and Gyoza no Ohsho--opened around the station in the 1980s, it can be said that the area around the station was most brilliant during this period.

Because there were many apartments for students in the residential district east of the station, and because many fast-food restaurants--such as Yoshinoya, hamburger shops and Gyoza no Ohsho--opened around the station in the 1980s, it can be said that the area around the station was most brilliant during this period.

sen.j: しかしこれらの店は修学院駅の利用者減少、京都市内の大学の南部移転などで主な客層である学生が減ったため撤退している。
sen.e: These shops, however, have already withdrawn due to the decrease of the number of passengers using Shugakuin Station as well as that of students, their principal customers, caused by the relocation of universities, which were once located in Kyoto City, to southern region.

These shops, however, have already withdrawn due to the decrease in the number of passengers using Shugakuin Station as well as the decrease in the area's student population--their principal customer constituency--caused by the relocation of universities from Kyoto City to the southern region.

These shops, however, have already withdrawn due to the decrease in the number of passengers using Shugakuin Station as well as the decrease in the area's student population--their principal customer constituency--caused by the relocation of universities from Kyoto City to the southern region.

sen.j: 一方修学院車庫では北山通の建設で一部建物の移動ならびに配線変更が行われ、入口に近い所の分岐器が同社唯一の3方向分岐となった。
sen.e: At Shugakuin carbarn, the transfer of some buildings as well as the modification of the arrangement of tracks was carried out due to the construction of Kitayama-dori Street and as a result, the turnout that is situated nearby the entrance became the company's sole 3 directions turnout.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: At Shugakuin car barn, the transfer of some buildings and modification of the track arrangement were carried out due to the construction of Kitayama-dori Street, and as a result the turnout that is situated nearby the entrance became the company's only three-direction turnout.

At Shugakuin car barn, the transfer of some buildings and modification of the track arrangement were carried out due to the construction of Kitayama-dori Street, and as a result the turnout that is situated nearby the entrance became the company's only three-direction turnout.

sen.j: このため、倉庫兼休憩所として用いられていた京都電燈デナ1形電車の廃車体が撤去されている。
sen.e: Under such circumstances, abolished Kyoto Dento Type Dena-1 train which had been used as a warehouse-cum-resting room was removed.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Under such circumstances, the abolished Kyoto Dento Type Dena-1 train--which had been used as a warehouse and resting room--was removed.
Under such circumstances, the abolished Kyoto Dento Type Dena-1 train--which had been used as a warehouse and resting room--was removed.

sen.j: 現在はさらにローズマンションが建設され、事務所が構内東側に移転するなどしているが配線等はほぼこのときのままである。
sen.e: Although Rose Mansion was constructed and the office was moved to the east side of the premises since then, the arrangement of tracks remains almost unchanged.
Although Rose Mansion was constructed and the office eventually moved to the east side of the premises, the arrangement of tracks remains almost unchanged.
Although Rose Mansion was constructed and the office eventually moved to the east side of the premises, the arrangement of tracks remains almost unchanged.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 北山通に面し、東大路通の北端部にある。
sen.e: This station faces Kitayama-dori Street and is located at the north tip of Higashioji-dori Street.
The station faces Kitayama-dori Street and is located at the north tip of Higashioji-dori Street.
The station faces Kitayama-dori Street and is located at the north tip of Higashioji-dori Street.

sen.j: 南東側のローズマンション裏には修学院車庫が隣接している。
sen.e: Shugakuin carbarn is situated just behind Rose Mansion that is located south-east of the station.
The Shugakuin car barn is situated just behind Rose Mansion, which is located southeast of the station.
The Shugakuin car barn is situated just behind Rose Mansion, which is located southeast of the station.

sen.j: また、駅のすぐ東側に白川通が、西側に川端通がある。
sen.e: Shirakawa-dori Street runs just east of the station and Kawabata-dori Street runs west of the station..
Shirakawa-dori Street runs just east of the station, and Kawabata-dori Street runs west of the station.
Shirakawa-dori Street runs just east of the station, and Kawabata-dori Street runs west of the station.

sen.j: 京都盆地の北東角にあたり、西側の東大路通と川端通の間にある旧大原街道は昔からの商店街である。
sen.e: The station is located at the north-east edge of Kyoto Basin and old Ohara-kaido situated between Higashioji-dori Street and Kawabata-dori Street, west of the station, is a traditional shopping district.

The station is located at the northeast edge of Kyoto Basin, and old Ohara-kaido situated between Higashioji-dori Street and Kawabata-dori Street, west of the station, is a traditional shopping district.

The station is located at the northeast edge of Kyoto Basin, and old Ohara-kaido Road situated between Higashioji-dori Street and Kawabata-dori Street, west of the station, is a traditional shopping district.

sen.j: 現在でも駅のごく周辺は、駅東側のプラザ修学院、駅西側に隣接（ホーム側にも入口あり）したフレスコ (スーパー)修学院店の他、数件のスーパーマーケットもある商業地域であるが、駅から少し離れると北山通、白川通沿い以外は住宅地となっている。
sen.e: Even at present, while the limitted area surrounding the station is a commercial district since there exists Plaza Shugakuin in the eastern area of the station and a few super-markets in the western area, including FRESCO Shugakuin Store which is adjacent to the station (it has an entrance on the side of a platform), the area a little far from the station is a residential district with the exception of the district along Kitayama-dori Street and Shirakawa-dori Street.

Even today, while the limited area surrounding the station is a commercial district--since Plaza Shugakuin is located in the eastern area of the station and there are a few supermarkets in the western area, including FRESCO Shugakuin Store, which is adjacent to the station (it has an entrance on the side of a platform)--the area slightly farther from the station is a residential district with the exception of the district along Kitayama-dori Street and Shirakawa-dori Street.

Even today, while the limited area surrounding the station is a commercial district--since Plaza Shugakuin is located in the eastern area of the station and there are a few supermarkets in the western area, including FRESCO (supermarket) Shugakuin Store, which is adjacent to the station (it has an entrance on the side of a platform)--the area slightly farther from the station is a residential district with the exception of the district along Kitayama-dori Street and Shirakawa-dori Street.
sen.cmt: FRESCOに〔スーパー）を追加しました。

sen.j: 東側に広がる住宅地は徒歩圏内としては同社沿線で一番大きく、付近には観光名所も多い。
sen.e: The residential district extending in the eastern area of the station is the biggest one among those lie along the company's line and are accessible on foot.
The residential district extending in the eastern area of the station is the biggest of those that lie along the company's line, and it's accessible on foot.

The residential district extending in the eastern area of the station is the biggest of those that lie along the company's line, and it's accessible on foot; also there are many premier sightseeing spots in the neighborhood.
sen.cmt: 付近には～ の訳を追加しました。

sen.j: このため輸送人員は当駅で半減する。
sen.e: Therefore, the number of passengers halves after passing this station.
Therefore, the number of passengers is reduced by half once the train passes this station.
Therefore, the number of passengers is reduced by half once the train passes this station.

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の松ヶ崎駅 (京都府)は西へ800mほど離れたところにある。
sen.e: Matsugasaki Station of the Karasuma Line of Kyoto Municipal Subway is located about 800m away to the westward from this station.
Matsugasaki Station, on the Karasuma Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway, is located about 800m west of this station.
Matsugasaki Station, on the Karasuma Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway, is located about 800 meters west of this station.

sen.j: 5号系統 (京都市営バス)・31号系統 (京都市営バス)・65号系統 (京都市営バス) - 国際会館駅経由 岩倉操車場行き

sen.j: 1925年（大正14年）9月27日 京都電燈の駅として開業。
sen.e: September 27, 1925 - The station commenced operation as a station of Kyoto Dento.
September 27, 1925: The station commenced operations as a facility of Kyoto Dento.
September 27, 1925: The station commenced operations as a facility of Kyoto Dento.

sen.j: 1942年（昭和17年）3月2日 会社譲渡により京福電気鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: March 2, 1942 - The station became a station of Keifuku Electric Railroad Co.,Ltd. thanks to the assignment of the company.
March 2, 1942: The station became a facility of Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., thanks to the assignment of the company.
March 2, 1942: The station became a facility of Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., due to the assignment of the company.

sen.j: 1970年（昭和45年）北山通の開通により南に100mほど移動。
sen.e: 1970 - The station was moved about 100m to southward due to the opening of Kitayama-dori Street.
1970: The station was moved about 100m south due to the opening of Kitayama-dori Street.
1970: The station was moved about 100 meters south due to the opening of Kitayama-dori Street.

sen.j: 1986年（昭和61年）4月1日 会社譲渡により叡山電鉄の駅となる。
sen.e: April 1, 1986 - The station became a station of Eizan Electric Railway Co.,Ltd. thanks to the assignment of the company.
April 1, 1986: The station became a facility of Eizan Electric Railway Co., Ltd., thanks to the assignment of the company.
April 1, 1986: The station became a facility of Eizan Electric Railway Co., Ltd., due to the assignment of the company.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。
